description: BR-31 is the District Transport Office for Vaishali, headquartered in the strategically vital city of Hajipur, located at the confluence of the Ganges and Gandak rivers. The office manages vehicle registration and licensing for a region that serves as a primary gateway between North Bihar and Patna via the Mahatma Gandhi Setu. As a historical hub known for being the world's oldest republic, the RTO handles significant commercial traffic related to agricultural trade and industrial developments in the Vaishali district.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Hajipur, Vaishali, Bihar
